## DateApiObject.dayOfWeek() method

Gets or sets day of week zero based, first is monday

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dayOfWeek(day?: number): number | DateApiObject<TDate>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  day | number | If specified, sets day of week |

<b>Returns:</b>

number \| [DateApiObject](./datetime.dateapiobject.md)<!-- -->&lt;TDate&gt;
